title: Curriculum Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) Capstone Project Design in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of evidence-based medicine (EBM) principles
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can comprehensively perform all stages of Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) from clinical scenario analysis to evidence application
Learners can select core keywords considering recency and reliability when designing literature search strategies
Learners can apply criteria to evaluate the quality level of selected papers and derive appropriate evidence
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
